text: one idea/question for batching create contacts <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/More-granular-batching-create-contact-system/m-p/807171#M64874> :thank-you:

hi everyone,
I have a question regarding the HubSpot child theme. Currently, HubSpot restricts the ten child themes in the Enterprise subscription. Can we have more than 10 child themes?

In case anyone has been beating their head against a wall around HubSpot's removal of all useful Form Analytics, here's an updated list of the active idea posts to upvote -
